7Environmental
EFFICIENCIESWe recently reduced the footprint of two of our facilities 
combined from 47,890 sq. ft to 13,890 sq. ft; which 
decreased monthly operating expenses from $69K per 
month to $16K per month; with no reduction in access to 
banking services.
An electric vehicle “Green Auto” loan program was 
created to support the purchase of electric, hybrid or 
fuel-efficient vehicles.
We also created an ESG Green Credit loan product 
for customers building or renovating a home that 
incorporates large scale environment-friendly sustainable 
initiatives or have a LEED Certifications.
